summary: "The Wire" is an American crime drama TV series created by David Simon for HBO. It aired from 2002 to 2008, with 60 episodes over five seasons. Set in Baltimore, each season focuses on a different city institution, like the drug trade or education. Simon based the show on his and his partner Ed Burns' experiences. Though it didn't win major awards at first, it's now considered one of TV's best shows for its realistic look at urban life and society.
title: The Wire
